management

Class SelfStudy

  • java.lang.Object
    • management.SelfStudy

  • public class SelfStudy
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the "self study" information.

    It is used by the EffortEntry class to store a list of all SelfStudy objects, that belong to the corresponding Module.

    Author:
    AJ, add names here...
    See Also:
    Module, EffortEntry

    • Field Detail

      • selfstudyID

        private long selfstudyID
        The ID of this SelfStudy Object.

        Used for retrieving/associating it from database.

      • title

        private java.lang.String title
        The title of this entry.

        Is used to create the documents.

      • time

        private int time
        Time/effort.

      • random

        private java.util.Random random
        A random number generator.

        Used to generate new IDs on creation of new entries.

        This class is not an extension of the Entry class, thus it needs an own generator.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SelfStudy

        public SelfStudy(java.lang.String title,
         int time)
        Use this constructor to create a new object, that is going to be filled with data.

        (Example: data needs to be stored into database)

        Parameters:
        title - The title of this entry. e.g. "Nachbearbeitung", "Übungsaufgaben"
        time - The time/effort needed by the title. (estimated)

      • SelfStudy

        public SelfStudy(long selfstudyID,
         int time,
         java.lang.String title)
        Use this constructor to import already existing data.

        (Example: data is already loaded from database)

        Parameters:
        selfstudyID - The ID of this SelfStudy Object.
        time - The time/effort needed by the title. (estimated)
        title - The title of this entry. e.g. "Nachbearbeitung", "Übungsaufgaben"
